title: Chai-1 Nextflow Pipeline Parameters
description: Schema for the parameters used in the Chai-1 structure prediction pipeline

input_options.title: Input Options
input_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

fasta.description: Path to input FASTA file containing the sequence(s) to predict.
fasta.help_text: The input FASTA file should contain one or more sequences in standard FASTA format.

msa_dir.help_text: If provided, should contain aligned.pqt files for the input sequences.

constraints.help_text: File containing structural constraints to guide the prediction.

model_dir.description: Directory where model weights and other artifacts will be downloaded.
model_dir.help_text: This directory will be used to store downloaded model weights and other required files.

output_options.title: Output Options
output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should save output data.

outdir.description: The output directory where results will be saved.

publish_dir_mode.description: Method used to save pipeline results to output directory.
publish_dir_mode.help_text: The Nextflow publishDir mode for saving output files. Available: symlink, rellink, link, copy, copyNoFollow, move.
